ldmx::PluginManagerAccessor Class Reference

Mixin for accessing the PluginManager. More...

Protected Attributes

PluginManager * pluginManager_

Detailed Description

Mixin for accessing the PluginManager.

Note:
This class is used to assign a plugin manager to each of the user action classes.
